instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: macbook air 13'' <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no backlight
threads.message:
hello,

the board was first not turning on, i replaced the <CAPACITOR>C5017</CAPACITOR> and C 5010 because it was corroded and now it does turn on but i dont get backlight,
also the fan is not spinning but.. i have already replaced the backlight driver but still the same, when i plug in the charger the voltage on backlight drops slowly from around 19V to 8.49V

threads.title: macbook air 13'' <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no backlight
threads.message:
Do you get USB activity?
Test known good compatible LCD assembly.
Check XW7720 integrity and read sticky post about Air backlight issues...
